verses.text: \w Listen|strong="H8085"\w* \w to|strong="H8085"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w*, \w you|strong="H2022"\w* \w cows|strong="H6510"\w* \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w Bashan|strong="H1316"\w*, \w who|strong="H2088"\w* \w are|strong="H1697"\w* \w on|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w mountain|strong="H2022"\w* \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w*, \w who|strong="H2088"\w* \w oppress|strong="H6231"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w poor|strong="H1800"\w*, \w who|strong="H2088"\w* \w crush|strong="H7533"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w needy|strong="H1800"\w*, \w who|strong="H2088"\w* \w tell|strong="H8085"\w* \w their|strong="H8085"\w* husbands, “Bring \w us|strong="H8085"\w* \w drinks|strong="H8354"\w*!”

\w The|strong="H5921"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3069"\w* \w GOD|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3117"\w* \w sworn|strong="H7650"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5375"\w* \w holiness|strong="H6944"\w*, “\w Behold|strong="H2009"\w*, \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w shall|strong="H3117"\w* come \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3117"\w* \w take|strong="H5375"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w away|strong="H5375"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w hooks|strong="H6793"\w*, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w last|strong="H3588"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w fish|strong="H1729"\w* \w hooks|strong="H6793"\w*.

\w You|strong="H3318"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w go|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w at|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w breaks|strong="H3318"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* wall, everyone \w straight|strong="H5048"\w* \w before|strong="H5048"\w* \w her|strong="H3318"\w*; \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H3318"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w cast|strong="H7993"\w* \w yourselves|strong="H3068"\w* \w into|strong="H3318"\w* \w Harmon|strong="H2038"\w*,” \w says|strong="H5002"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.

“\w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w also|strong="H1571"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w given|strong="H5414"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w cleanness|strong="H5356"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w teeth|strong="H8127"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w lack|strong="H2640"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w town|strong="H5892"\w*; \w yet|strong="H1571"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* haven’t \w returned|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w*,” \w says|strong="H5002"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w So|strong="H3808"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* \w staggered|strong="H5128"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w one|strong="H3808"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w drink|strong="H8354"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w were|strong="H4325"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w satisfied|strong="H7646"\w*; \w yet|strong="H5704"\w* \w you|strong="H5704"\w* haven’t \w returned|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w me|strong="H7725"\w*,” \w says|strong="H5002"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.

“\w I|strong="H5704"\w* \w struck|strong="H5221"\w* \w you|strong="H5704"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w blight|strong="H7711"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w mildew|strong="H3420"\w* \w many|strong="H7235"\w* times \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w gardens|strong="H1593"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w vineyards|strong="H3754"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* swarming \w locusts|strong="H1501"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* devoured \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w fig|strong="H8384"\w* \w trees|strong="H2132"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w olive|strong="H2132"\w* \w trees|strong="H2132"\w*; \w yet|strong="H5704"\w* \w you|strong="H5704"\w* haven’t \w returned|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w me|strong="H7725"\w*,” \w says|strong="H5002"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.

“\w I|strong="H5704"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w plagues|strong="H1870"\w* amongst \w you|strong="H7971"\w* \w like|strong="H5973"\w* \w I|strong="H5704"\w* \w did|strong="H3068"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*. \w I|strong="H5704"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w slain|strong="H2026"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w young|strong="H7971"\w* \w men|strong="H4264"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w carried|strong="H5927"\w* \w away|strong="H7971"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w horses|strong="H5483"\w*. \w I|strong="H5704"\w* filled \w your|strong="H3068"\w* nostrils \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* stench \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w camp|strong="H4264"\w*, \w yet|strong="H5704"\w* \w you|strong="H7971"\w* haven’t \w returned|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w me|strong="H7971"\w*,” \w says|strong="H5002"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.

“\w I|strong="H5704"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w overthrown|strong="H2015"\w* some \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H5704"\w*, \w as|strong="H5704"\w* \w when|strong="H1961"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w overthrew|strong="H2015"\w* \w Sodom|strong="H5467"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w Gomorrah|strong="H6017"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H5704"\w* \w were|strong="H1961"\w* \w like|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w burning|strong="H8316"\w* stick \w plucked|strong="H5337"\w* \w out|strong="H5337"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w fire|strong="H8316"\w*; \w yet|strong="H5704"\w* \w you|strong="H5704"\w* haven’t \w returned|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w me|strong="H7725"\w*,” \w says|strong="H5002"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.

“\w Therefore|strong="H3651"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3478"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*, \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*; \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3478"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*, \w prepare|strong="H3559"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w meet|strong="H7125"\w* \w your|strong="H6213"\w* God, \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w*, \w behold|strong="H2009"\w*, \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w forms|strong="H3335"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w*, \w creates|strong="H1254"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w wind|strong="H7307"\w*, \w declares|strong="H5046"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* man \w what|strong="H4100"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w thought|strong="H7808"\w*, \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w makes|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w morning|strong="H7837"\w* \w darkness|strong="H5890"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w treads|strong="H1869"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w high|strong="H1116"\w* \w places|strong="H1116"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* earth: \w The|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Armies|strong="H6635"\w*, \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w*.”
